Valve.VR.InteractionSystem.ShowVRUIWhenCollidingScript Class Reference

Controls the visibility and positioning of VR UI elements when colliding with a certain threshold. More...

Detailed Description

Controls the visibility and positioning of VR UI elements when colliding with a certain threshold.
